sn7.15:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena manatthaddho nama brahmano savatthiyam pativasati.
sn7.15:1.3: So neva mataram abhivadeti, na pitaram abhivadeti, na acariyam abhivadeti, na jetthabhataram abhivadeti.
sn7.15:1.4: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava mahatiya parisaya parivuto dhammam deseti.
sn7.15:1.6: “ayam kho samano gotamo mahatiya parisaya parivuto dhammam deseti.
sn7.15:1.8: Sace mam samano gotamo alapissati, ahampi tam alapissami.
sn7.15:1.9: No ce mam samano gotamo alapissati, ahampi nalapissami”ti.
sn7.15:1.10: Atha kho manatthaddho brahmano yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva tunhibhuto ekamantam atthasi.
sn7.15:1.13: “nayam samano gotamo kinci janati”ti tatova puna nivattitukamo ahosi.
sn7.15:1.14: Atha kho bhagava manatthaddhassa brahmanassa cetasa cetoparivitakkamannaya manatthaddham brahmanam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
sn7.15:3.2: “cittam me samano gotamo janati”ti tattheva bhagavato padesu sirasa nipatitva bhagavato padani mukhena ca paricumbati panihi ca parisambahati, namanca saveti:
sn7.15:3.4: Atha kho sa parisa abbhutavittajata ahosi:
sn7.15:3.6: Ayanhi manatthaddho brahmano neva mataram abhivadeti, na pitaram abhivadeti, na acariyam abhivadeti, na jetthabhataram abhivadeti;
sn7.15:3.7: atha ca pana samane gotame evarupam paramanipaccakaram karoti”ti.
sn7.15:3.8: Atha kho bhagava manatthaddham brahmanam etadavoca:
sn7.15:3.11: Atha kho manatthaddho brahmano sake asane nisiditva bhagavantam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
sn7.15:7.1: Evam vutte, manatthaddho brahmano bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn7.15:7.3: upasakam mam bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
